attributes.action: Ask the BBC to erect a statue in memory of Joey Deacon (and his friend)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There should be a permenant memorial of this extraordinary person, who was a inspiration to all of us growing up in the eighties. The children of today could well do with similar role models. I would suggest that the statue/memorial should be placed in the Blue Peter Garden.

rejection.details: You should take your request to the BBC.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
